reactor.io.net

Interface NetClient<IN,OUT>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<NetChannel<IN,OUT>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyTcpClient, TcpClient, ZeroMQTcpClient

    public interface NetClient<IN,OUT>
extends Iterable<NetChannel<IN,OUT>>
    A network-aware client.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Promise<Boolean> close()
      Close this client and the underlying channel.
      void close(Consumer<Boolean> onClose)
      Close this client and the underlying channel and invoke the given Consumer when the operation has completed.
      Promise<NetChannel<IN,OUT>> open()
      Open a channel to the configured address and return a Promise that will be fulfilled with the connected NetChannel.
      Stream<NetChannel<IN,OUT>> open(Reconnect reconnect)
      Open a channel to the configured address and return a reactor.core.composable.Stream that will be populated by the NetChannels every time a connection or reconnection is made.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

        Open a channel to the configured address and return a reactor.core.composable.Stream that will be populated by the NetChannels every time a connection or reconnection is made.
        Parameters:
        reconnect - the reconnection strategy to use when disconnects happen
